data.description:
Welcome to **Teledomica**,

Prepare to transform the way you use your headset. Our innovative app redefines how you interact with products, offering an immersive experience right in the comfort of your home.

With Teledomica, you can:
- Easily **upload** your 3D models in GLB format.
- **Share** your 3D models with friends.
- **Publish** your 3D models to Showcases to be seen by our community.
- Enjoy **photorealistic** and **true-to-size** models.
- Toggle between **VR and Mixed Reality** (passthrough) modes.
- **Combine** different 3D models seamlessly.
- **Inspect** and interact with 3D model layers.
- Use easy **hand gestures** for a controller-free experience.
- **Save** your favorite 3D models to your library.
- Easily **manage and control** your content from your mobile or PC.
- Stay updated with the **latest trends**.

Teledomica is an innovative platform that can transform your VR headset into a tool that enhances your daily life through mixed reality experiences. Whether you want to use it for styling decisions, furnishing your home, digitally enlarging your retail space, or simply for fun and learning, Teledomica has you covered.

- Free Membership: Upload **3D models for free** in your private space
- Enterprise Plans: Available at www.teledomica.com

Try Teledomica and style your space in mixed reality now.
